Drizzle with oil and toss to coat; season with salt and pepper.Step 2If using relish, add to cauliflower and toss to coat. Season with more salt and pepper.Read More: The 29 New Essential Recipes from the Bon Appétit Test KitchenHow would you rate Shaved Cauliflower?Leave a ReviewTell us what you thinkReviews (1)Back to TopTriangleServed this--doubled-- at a recent family dinner.
